name: Clyde
passiveDesc: Clyde can fully utilize Hyperion Energy. When Clyde has Hyperion Energy, he will transform into Overclocked state. During the Overclocked state. Clyde's Normal and Charged Attacks will be converted into Quantum DMG and deal additional DMG based on 8% of his Hyperion Energy. During Overclocked state, if Hyperion Energy is less than 100% of Clyde's Max HP, his Normal Attack "Eclipser" will gains Eclipsed Kingdom effect. When Normal Skill "Graviton Mark Protocol" is casted during this state, it will gains Voidpiercer effect.
rTalentDesc: Clyde's Normal and Charged Attacks generate 1 Flux.

talent1.name: ■■■■■■■■'s Decendent
talent1.desc: Being the decendent of ■■■■■■■■, Clyde gains 40% Quantum DMG Bonus.

talent2.name: Hyperion Energy
talent2.desc: Hyperion Energy can be accumulated up to 200% of the Character's Max HP. Hyperion Energy can impact the affected character in various way.

talent3.name: Hyperion Energy: Rejection
talent3.desc: When a character is affected by Hyperion Energy, they are immune to healing from allies or external effects and can only heal themselves. If another source attempts to heal them, the healing is nullified, and the Hyperion Energy is reduced by an amount equal to the HP that would have been healed. Additionally, if the affected character cannot utilize Hyperion Energy, their Crit Rate is reduced by 24% and Disorder DMG is reduced by 40%.

normalAttackDesc:
Clyde deals 40% Physical ATK as Physical DMG to the opponent.
Eclipsed Kingdom: Eclipser will fire 1 extra shot, increasing his Hyperion Energy by 80% of the DMG dealt.
chargedAttackDesc: Clyde deals 60% Physical ATK as Physical DMG to the opponent and absorbs all Graviton Marks from the opponents. If the Graviton Mark is in Temporal Latch, it absorbs 12 (+38% Opponent's Current HP) as Hyperion Energy, if the Graviton Mark is in Entropy Core, it absorbs 218 (+8% Opponent's Max HP) multiplied by the duration of Graviton Mark as Hyperion Energy.
normalSkillDesc:
Clyde strikes nearby opponents using Eclipser, dealing 112 (+48% Physical ATK) as Quantum DMG and applying Graviton Mark: Temporal Latch to opponents hit for 8 Cycles. Temporal Latch: Gradually deals 12 (+18% Physical ATK) as Physical DMG each Cycle. Entropy Core: After an opponent is affected by Temporal Latch for 2 Cycles, it will transform into Entropy Core dealing 98 (+51% Physical ATK) as Quantum DMG each Cycle. This effect carries over the duration from Temporal Latch.
Voidpiercer: Clyde uses Voidpiercer and launches a Chrono Shard, dealing 68 (+11% Hyperion Energy) as Physical DMG. If Hyperion Energy is greater than 100% of Clyde's Max HP, Chrono Shard will deal 211 + (21% Hyperion Energy) as Quantum DMG, consuming all Hyperion Energy, healing himself by 40% of his consumed Hyperion Energy and exiting the Overclocked state. This skill can be cased independently without the use of Flux during the Overclocked State.
riftedSkillDesc: Clyde absorbs all Graviton Mark from the opponent and unleashes a Rfit Collapse using Voidpiercer, dealing 214 (+112% Physical ATK) (+26% Hyperion Energy) as Quantum DMG, consuming his Hyperion Energy and exiting from Overclocked state, and healing himself by 60% of consumed Hyperion Energy.
fragment1Desc: Clyde will gain 40% extra Hyperion Energy while absorbing Graviton Marks.
fragment2Desc: "Graviton Mark Protocol" will directly apply Graviton Mark: Entropy Core to opponents.
fragment3Desc: "Graviton Mark Protocol" level is increased by 3.
fragment4Desc: Dealing Quantum DMG generates 25 Surges. This effect can occour once every 3 Cycles.
fragment6Desc: Quantum DMG Bonus is increased by 20%. The DMG of Collapse Singularity is increased by Clyde's ATK multiplied by 700% of Clyde's current Hyperion Energy percentage. For 3 Cycles after Clyde uses Graviton Mark Protocol, Clyde gains 10% CRIT Rate and 80% CRIT DMG. This effect can triggered once every 8 Cycles.

record2.description:
Clyde (↓): Clyde has an insane DMG output making other characters fall back behind the meta.
	Flux Capacity: 0 >> 5
	"Graviton Mark Protocol" Flux Cost: 0 >> 3
	"Collapse Singularity" Surge Cost: 0 >> 60

[Talent: Quantum Drive] (↓)
	Normal ATK DMG Bonus: 16% Hyperion Energy >> 8% Hyperion Energy
	Voidpiercer DMG (Normal): 100 (+20% Hyperion Energy) >> 68 (+11% Hyperion Energy)
	Voidpiercer DMG (Enhanced): 150 (+40% Hyperion Energy) as Physical DMG >> 211 + (21% Hyperion Energy) as Quantum DMG
	Hyperion Energy Interval: 50% Clyde's Max HP >> 100% Clyde's Max HP
	[New Effect] During the Overclocked state, if Hyperion Energy is less than 100% of Clyde's Max HP, his Normal and Charged Attacks are converted into Quantum DMG.
	[New Effect] Hyperion Energy gained from Normal Attacks can now be gained from CRIT Hits.
	[New Effect] Clyde's Normal and Charged Attacks generate 1 Flux.

[Charged Attack: Graviton Absorption] (~)
	Temporal Latch Absorption Value: 5 (+40% Opponent's Current HP) >> 12 (+38% Opponent's Current HP)
	Entropy Code Absorption Value: 200 (+20% Opponent's Max HP) >> 218 (+8% Opponent's Max HP) multiplied by the duration of Graviton Mark

[Normal Skill: Graviton Mark Protocol] (~)
	Eclipser DMG: 120 (+40% Physical ATK) as Physical DMG >> 112 (+48% Physical ATK) as Quantum DMG
	Temporal Latch DMG: 5 (+20% Physical ATK) >> 12 (+18% Physical ATK)
	Entropy Core DMG: 30 (+60% Physical ATK) as Physical ATK >> 98 (+51% Physical ATK) as Quantum DMG

[Rifted Skill: Collapse Singularity] (↓)
	Collapse Singularity DMG: 200 (+40% Hyperion Energy) (+100% Physical ATK) as Physical DMG >> 214 (+112% Physical ATK) (+26% Hyperion Energy) as Quantum DMG
